summary: Like a Whore, Unpack My Heart With Words
title: Like a Whore, Unpack My Heart With Words
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ng95pf

by thefutureisbright

‘Though this be madness, yet there is method in’t.’

What happens when the stony faced, belligerent artistic director of the RSC meets the lead in his production of Hamlet, and, well, doesn’t like him very much.

Or: Phil is an actor cast to play Hamlet in the production celebrating the 50th anniversary of the RSC, and Dan thinks he’s been miscast. To put it mildly.

Words: 1014, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, Original Characters
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Theatre, References to Shakespeare, seriously, There are going to be hundreds of references to Shakespeare, Eventual Happy Ending, Eventual Romance, maybe smut, I’m undecided yet


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Ng95pf

summary: Majority of the time, I’m either watching danandphilgames, or just phil’s videos. I have some friends that ask the question of:...
body:
Majority of the time, I’m either watching danandphilgames, or just phil’s videos. I have some friends that ask the question of:

“why not Dan? You dress like him, you act like him, your personalities are practically identical, why are you so into phils videos and not dan’s as much?”

LOOK.

I love them both equally. there is absolutely no doubt there. I still watch every video Dan uploads, i watch every gaming video, i have all of his post notifs on for everything just like i do for phil. They are equals. 

While I can relate to dan and dans struggles more personally, just like Dan, I need that positivity of Phil in my life. He makes sweet, lighthearted videos. He’s so positive and optimistic and that’s the type of person I need in my life. I need to surround myself with Phil’s because I’ve been a self-deprecating dan for too long

title: Puppy School
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2NouEUm

by cafephan

Phil has a five month old Labrador puppy, Thor. He struggles to control him, leading to his parents booking him onto a bulk of puppy training classes, which are led by Dan.

blog.name: alittledizzy
blog.title: a.little.dizzy
blog.description:
there is a voice inside of you
that whispers all day long
i feel that this is right for me
i know that this is wrong
no teacher preacher parent friend
or wise man can decide
what's right for you - just listen to
the voice that speaks inside
- shel silverstein

Mandy. 30s.
Scifi fan, youtube fan, puppy fan.
RPF heavy blog.

Don't be a dick. :)

blog.name: knlalla
blog.title: ??¿¿?¿
blog.description:
katie || 24 || not straight || she/her || my ao3

hello lovelies thanks for joining me
tell me about your day

tags: anyways i'll never be over this
and anon dear i hope your day is a little bit better
summary: Hi! I've had a day. Not really bad but not really great either and, if you're not too busy, I was wondering if you could talk...
question: Hi! I've had a day. Not really bad but not really great either and, if you're not too busy, I was wondering if you could talk about fluffy/ sweet dnp somehow. Your blog and dnp always cheer me up and I could use just a little extra cheering up right now. I hope you're doing well and thank you so much for being so positive and lovely. (exile is amazing btw <3)
answer:
oof hi dear??? i’m so sorry you didn’t have a great day, i hope your day today’s been better so far

i cannot get over this pic so i’m gonna fuckin talk abt it okay i’m soft and in pain from this okay soft and in pain

there’s a fucking beach they are on a beach and dan is just like ‘yknow what. yknow fuckin wot. i’m gonna take a pic of phil’ like i mean the beach is behind him right but phil takes up 2/3 of this pic and he is clearly the focus.

like don’t imagine dan sat behind phil, curled up on his own towel bc dan hates the sand and there is no way they can fit on a single towel together, and frankly he’s too enamored with watching phil to bother trying to squish together on one anyway. don’t imagine phil curling his fingers and toes into the sand at the edges of his towel, grateful that the shade from the massive tree has kept it cool because it’s a feeling he absolutely loves, and definitely don’t imagine dan watching him do this - a thing phil does at every beach they go to, in spite of dan’s protests that he’s gonna get sand everywhere in the hotel, now, phil, do you really have to do that? 

don’t imagine dan biting his lip about it this time, though, bc phil just looks so relaxed, and dan can’t bring himself to take that away from him. don’t imagine dan watching phil’s hair get blown back by the breeze, and don’t imagine dan smiling because phil doesn’t seem bothered to fix it, doesn’t seem bothered by anything, and dan sort of just has to capture the moment. 

don’t imagine dan thinking that sometimes their life is a storm, a bit much for either of them to handle, and just being incredibly grateful they’ve found some calm in the midst of it all. being immensely grateful that phil has a moment of peace, a moment free from worrying about their life or about the world or anything at all. and don’t imagine dan with a soft smile on his lips as he takes the picture, more focused on phil than he is on the scenery, snapping twelve copies of the same picture because he knows he’ll want to scroll through them all and relive each individual moment later. 

don’t imagine dan sticking his leg out and poking phil with a toe, getting him to turn. don’t imagine phil’s mild confusion when dan climbs up from his carefully-positioned spot on the towel - one that keeps him well clear of any sand - and steps over onto phil’s. and for the love of god do not imagine dan squeezing himself beside phil on his towel that has not nearly enough room for them both, already resigned to finding sand in his shorts for the next decade, because he just needs to sit and exist with phil in this moment, in this peacefulness.
